00060 namespace {
00061   const char *DEFAULT_HOST = "localhost";
00062   const int DEFAULT_PORT = 11255;
00063   const int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT = 10;
00064   const char *usage[] = {
00065     "usage: sampleClient [OPTIONS] <input-file>",
00066     "",
00067     "OPTIONS:",
00068     "  --host=<name>   Specifies the host to connect to (default = localhost)",
00069     "  --port=<n>      Specifies the port to connect to (default = 11255)",
00070     "  --reactors=<n>  Specifies the number of reactors (default=1)",
00071     "  --recv-addr=<addr>  Let the server connect to us by listening for",
00072     "                  connection request on <addr> (host:port).  The address",
00073     "                  that the server is connecting from should be the same",
00074     "                  as what's specified with --host and --port or the defaults.",
00075     "                  (TCP only)",
00076     "  --timeout=<t>   Specifies the connection timeout in seconds (default=10)",
00077     "  --verbose       Generate verbose output",
00078     "  --udp           Operate in UDP mode instead of TCP",
00079     "",
00080     "This is a sample program to test the AsyncComm library.  It establishes",
00081     "a connection with the sampleServer and sends each line of the input file",
00082     "to the server.  Each reply from the server is echoed to stdout.",
00083     (const char *)0
00084   };
00085   bool g_verbose = false;
00086 }

00095 class ResponseHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00096 
00097 public:
00098 
00099   ResponseHandler() : m_queue(), m_mutex(), m_cond() { return; }
00100   virtual ~ResponseHandler() { return; }
00101 
00102   virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) = 0;
00103 
00104   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &event_ptr) = 0;
00105 
00106 protected:
00107   queue<EventPtr>   m_queue;
00108   boost::mutex      m_mutex;
00109   boost::condition  m_cond;
00110 };

00122 class ResponseHandlerTCP : public ResponseHandler {
00123 
00124 public:
00125 
00126   ResponseHandlerTCP() : ResponseHandler(), m_connected(false) { return; }
00127 
00128   virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00129     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00130     if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00131       if (g_verbose)
00132         HT_INFOF("Connection Established - %s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00133       m_connected = true;
00134       m_cond.notify_one();
00135     }
00136     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00137       if (event_ptr->error != 0) {
00138         HT_INFOF("Disconnect : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00139       }
00140       else {
00141         HT_INFO("Disconnect.");
00142       }
00143       m_connected = false;
00144       m_cond.notify_one();
00145     }
00146     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00147       HT_INFOF("Error : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00148       //exit(1);
00149     }
00150     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00151       m_queue.push(event_ptr);
00152       m_cond.notify_one();
00153     }
00154   }
00155 
00156   bool wait_for_connection() {
00157     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00158     if (m_connected)
00159       return true;
00160     m_cond.wait(lock);
00161     return m_connected;
00162   }
00163 
00164   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00165     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00166     while (m_queue.empty()) {
00167       if (m_connected == false)
00168         return false;
00169       m_cond.wait(lock);
00170     }
00171     event_ptr = m_queue.front();
00172     m_queue.pop();
00173     return true;
00174   }
00175 
00176 private:
00177   bool m_connected;
00178 };
00179

00186 class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00187 public:
00188   HandlerFactory(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00189     m_dispatch_handler_ptr = dhp;
00190   }
00191   virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00192     dhp = m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00193   }
00194 private:
00195   DispatchHandlerPtr m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00196 };

00206 class ResponseHandlerUDP : public ResponseHandler {
00207 
00208 public:
00209 
00210   ResponseHandlerUDP() : ResponseHandler() { return; }
00211 
00212   virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00213     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00214     if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00215       m_queue.push(event_ptr);
00216       m_cond.notify_one();
00217     }
00218     else {
00219       HT_INFOF("%s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00220       //exit(1);
00221     }
00222   }
00223 
00224   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00225     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00226     while (m_queue.empty()) {
00227       m_cond.wait(lock);
00228     }
00229     event_ptr = m_queue.front();
00230     m_queue.pop();
00231     return true;
00232   }
00233 };

00242 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00243   Comm *comm;
00244   int rval;
00245   const char *host = DEFAULT_HOST;
00246   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00247   uint16_t port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00248   time_t timeout = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT;
00249   int reactor_count = 1;
00250   const char *in_file = 0;
00251   HeaderBuilder hbuilder;
00252   int error;
00253   EventPtr event_ptr;
00254   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfp;
00255   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00256   ResponseHandler *resp_handler;
00257   bool udp_mode = false;
00258   string line;
00259   int outstanding = 0;
00260   int max_outstanding = 50;
00261   const char *str;
00262   struct sockaddr_in local_addr;
00263 
00264   memset(&local_addr, 0, sizeof(local_addr));
00265 
00266   if (argc == 1)
00267     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00268 
00269   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00270   ReactorFactory::initialize(1);
00271 
00272   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00273     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--host=", 7))
00274       host = &argv[i][7];
00275     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7)) {
00276       rval = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00277       if (rval <= 1024 || rval > 65535) {
00278         cerr << "Invalid port.  Must be in the range of 1024-65535." << endl;
00279         exit(1);
00280       }
00281       port = rval;
00282     }
00283     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--timeout=", 10))
00284       timeout = (time_t)atoi(&argv[i][10]);
00285     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--udp"))
00286       udp_mode = true;
00287     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--reactors=", 11))
00288       reactor_count = atoi(&argv[i][11]);
00289     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--recv-addr=", 12)) {
00290       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&local_addr, &argv[i][12]))
00291         HT_ABORT;
00292     }
00293     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose")) {
00294       g_verbose = true;
00295     }
00296     else if (in_file == 0)
00297       in_file = argv[i];
00298     else
00299       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00300   }
00301 
00302   if (in_file == 0)
00303     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00304 
00305   if (!InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host, port))
00306     exit(1);
00307 
00308   comm = Comm::instance();
00309 
00310   ifstream myfile(in_file);
00311 
00312   if (!myfile.is_open()) {
00313     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open file '%s' : %s", in_file, strerror(errno));
00314     return 0;
00315   }
00316 
00317   if (udp_mode) {
00318     assert(local_addr.sin_port == 0);
00319     resp_handler = new ResponseHandlerUDP();
00320     dhp = resp_handler;
00321     port++;
00322     InetAddr::initialize(&local_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00323     comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&local_addr, 0, dhp);
00324   }
00325   else {
00326     resp_handler = new ResponseHandlerTCP();
00327     dhp = resp_handler;
00328 
00329     if (local_addr.sin_port == 0) {
00330       if ((error = comm->connect(addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00331         HT_ERRORF("Comm::connect error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00332         exit(1);
00333       }
00334     }
00335     else {
00336       chfp = new HandlerFactory(dhp);
00337       comm->listen(local_addr, chfp, dhp);
00338     }
00339     if (!((ResponseHandlerTCP *)resp_handler)->wait_for_connection())
00340       exit(1);
00341 
00342   }
00343 
00344   while (!myfile.eof()) {
00345     getline (myfile,line);
00346     if (line.length() > 0) {
00347       CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(hbuilder, encoded_length_str16(line)));
00348       cbp->append_str16(line);
00349       int retries = 0;
00350 
00351       if (udp_mode) {
00352         if ((error = comm->send_datagram(addr, local_addr, cbp)) != Error::OK) {
00353           HT_ERRORF("Problem sending datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00354           return 1;
00355         }
00356       }
00357       else {
00358         while ((error = comm->send_request(addr, timeout, cbp, resp_handler)) != Error::OK) {
00359           if (error == Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED) {
00360             if (retries == 5) {
00361               HT_ERROR("Connection timeout.");
00362               return 1;
00363             }
00364             poll(0, 0, 1000);
00365             retries++;
00366           }
00367           else {
00368             HT_ERRORF("CommEngine::send_message returned '%s'", Error::get_text(error));
00369             return 1;
00370           }
00371         }
00372       }
00373       outstanding++;
00374 
00375       if (outstanding  > max_outstanding) {
00376         if (!resp_handler->get_response(event_ptr))
00377           break;
00378         try {
00379           str = decode_str16(&event_ptr->message, &event_ptr->message_len);
00380           if (*str != 0)
00381             cout << "ECHO: " << str << endl;
00382           else
00383             cout << "[NULL]" << endl;
00384         }
00385         catch (Exception &e) {
00386           cout <<"Error: "<< e << endl;
00387         }
00388         outstanding--;
00389       }
00390     }
00391   }
00392 
00393   while (outstanding > 0 && resp_handler->get_response(event_ptr)) {
00394     try {
00395       str = decode_str16(&event_ptr->message, &event_ptr->message_len);
00396       if (str != 0)
00397         cout << "ECHO: " << str << endl;
00398       else
00399         cout << "[NULL]" << endl;
00400     }
00401     catch (Exception &e) {
00402       cout <<"Error: "<< e << endl;
00403     }
00404     //cout << "out = " << outstanding << endl;
00405     outstanding--;
00406   }
00407 
00408 
00409   myfile.close();
00410 
00411   ReactorFactory::destroy();
00412 
00413   return 0;
00414 }
